Attached please find Warden N'Diaye's response to Your Honor's inquiry. Please let us know if you need further information.

Thank you,
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)

Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email with attachments. The email is from a Supervisory Staff Attorney at CLC New York, Metropolitan Correctional Center. The email is dated August 12, 2019. There are redactions in the sender's contact information and name.
